Reviews.Title: s4 active
Reviews.Author: Derick
Reviews.Content: So far my phone works OK. It does what it is supposed to do.. device functions are great- camera, bluetooth, IR flasher, etc. etc. etc.Going from an iPhone to this, I am insanely impressed by the sensitivity, clarity, noise cancelling, sound processing of the microphone-- it is hard to believe but I can actually talk to my phone like it is advertised, giving it commands and talking instead of typing, a very welcomed change-up from talking to my iPhone in a robot voice and dialogue that even the phone didn't ever really understand.The battery is mildly impressive compared to almost any similar device this powerful, and gives me 2-3 full days on average, making calls, sending texts, browsing the web, just light to average use. Usually only a day or 2 with heavy use.Reason it doesn't get an awesome rating?MAIN REASON--Warranty does not cover water damage..so it was almost a waste to pick this device instead of something else. .. that's right your "water resistant" device is not protected by any warranty if there is any water damage. Great to find a company standing so firmly behind it's products and how they are advertised.Also, there is a lot of bloatware that requires you root your phone, install this, uninstall that, back-up that, delete this....I spent the first 2 weeks figuring out all that crap and reducing the amount of information my phone was recording and sending and that is totally unacceptable to have to work so hard to protect my privacy and simplify my device.Would I buy it again? good question....

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: lisa1774
Reviews.Content: So easy to use.  I have the blue and the husband has the grey.  Put a clear case around it because it is kind of slick to hold onto - Have tried it in water and had no problems - Headed to the beach next week so we will see how it holds up in sand!

Reviews.Title: Great phone, Horrible Sound Quality for the Caller to you!
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: If it weren't for just one issue, the phone would be a 5+ Star rating. The audio quality for the people calling me is horrible. Whoever calls me.....and I mean every person who calls, here's a horrible echo. Every time, on every call. If I put them on speaker phone or use a bluetooth headset, the audio quality is crisp and clear. It could be a defective phone, and I may try to send it back thru Samsung, but that's what happens when you buy on Amazon, or Ebay. It's tougher to take care of problems like this.  The rest of the phone is GREAT....Camera and all. I like the way the phone operates, it's easy to use, and I can carefully rinse it off when i wish. I won't dunk it in water...It's water resistant, but it shouldn't be taken into under water situations...it's just too risky.So, as long as you have a good headset...this phone is tops!Update 2-2014I decided to see if Samsung would replace the phone under warranty...Sure it's been over 6 months, but it's got a year warranty on it... or does it??I spoke to tech support at Samsung....He was going through his little repair script...Ok, lets clear the phone cache...Ok, lets check this setting and that... Finally I said, Ya know, I've done a wipe and a hard reset of this phone at least twice. A few weeks ago, it's firmware was upgraded to Android 4.3 .  Still have the horrible echo. The tech even called the phone and confirmed the echo. Yup it's bad alright. Then he said..........Call your provider for service. You mean, Samsung won't service the phone?  No, talk to your provider.  But I bought the phone on Ebay...New, with receipts, and I use Net10 as my provider. They didn't sell me the phone. I use the ATT Network with Net10, but ATT certainly isn't going to help me.  He talked to his supervisor and that's all they would tell me.....Talk to your provider. Anything else we can help you with today? Thank you for choosing Samsung.SO, I guess i should have purchased a warranty from Square Trade or similar. Square Trade claims they will cover your device even when the Manufacturer won't.Ok....Next time.....

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I've own this phone for around 2 months now and it has work smoothly without any issue.It has already been on the water for around 15 mins and is still working. The battery last pretty long around 12 hrs. Nothing to complain about until now.

Reviews.Title: Battery Door NOT covered by warranty.
Reviews.Author: Scorpion E
Reviews.Content: I've raved about this phone since I bought it new at an AT&T; store.  For the first 4.5 months, everything was perfect.  I was happy that my phone resisted water properly.  Stories about water leaks with the S4 Active scared me at first.  However, last week was the start of my one problem with this phone.  I held it in my hand and to my surprise, one of the back cover tabs wasn't secured.  I blamed myself for missing one tab and was lucky that the phone was nowhere near water.  A couple of days later, the same thing happened.  I found that same tab popped out so I popped it back in.  Now this tab pops out every few hours.  A trip to the AT&T; store where I bought it didn't result with a new phone.  Instead I was asked to call back the following week to see if they have any S4 Active returns and that they would just swap out the back covers.  I was also encouraged to contact Samsung.  That didn't go too well either.  The support person I'm currently in contact with has no sympathy and immediately told me that the back cover is not covered by the warranty.  This is the main part of the phone that keeps the water out of the batter and sim card compartment.  If there is something wrong with it, shouldn't it be covered?  I should also mention that the battery door has only been removed a few times since I bought the phone.  The phone, outside of the back door issue, actually works well for me.  I loved that it was at least water resistance in case the phone accidentally gets wet.  I was excited when it was marketed as a waterproof phone as all our vacations usually are some sort of water.  The phone has nice features and the performance is fine.  Battery lasts a whole day, which is fine for me.  Every now and then I would charge it during day to make sure I have enough power for the evening.  I love the bigger screen compared to my old iPhone.  I recommended this phone to everyone I met.  But with this battery door issue is killing me.  It would  be fine if this is a standard S4 since a replacement door is easily available.  But there's nowhere in the world right now to get a replacement back door for the S4 Active.I would still recommend this phone to anyone looking for a good performing phone that could resist water in case of accidents.  However, I strongly caution you to check those tabs frequently to make sure they are still clipped in.  When those clips start to pop out, hope that there will be more replacement doors available because Samsung won't cover them.

Reviews.Title: Best phone on the market as of right now
Reviews.Author: Dave Gomez
Reviews.Content: Its a very fast phone with a long lasting battery that has more adaptability than ive had with any other phone. to buy an OTB cable for this thing is almost a need, to be able to move stuff from flashdrives/cameras/etc to the device or anything else is amazing. i can even plug in a xbox 360 wired controller and play games.On top of all that its the Active series, meaning its water resistant allowing to take it for runs in the rain and what not, then also its more durable, im a very active guy doing parkour and freerunning so its nice to have a phone that can hold its own, but then back to the side of me thats computer science having the processor to b able to keep up with speeds so i can control my desktop at home! AMazing product with amazonprime = two day shipping. best buy ever.

Reviews.Title: not great in rural areas
Reviews.Author: Heather "Sew Crazy"
Reviews.Content: The phone it self I'ed great. It has more bells and whistles than I could hope for. The internal antenna however needs to be much stronger. My husband's phone is 3 years old and will pick up service when I have none.

Reviews.Title: nice phone, love the dust proof / water proof feature
Reviews.Author: jimmygoroar
Reviews.Content: great phone.  had the regular s4 when it came out and switched to this.  im a carpenter and the dust proof feature is great for my line of work.  plus having kids the water proof feature is great for when they get their hands on it...or around it in general.  the phone, like all the large screen smartphones, will eat through a full battery like no ones business...the dimmer you can keep the screen the better, as well as turning off the gps when not in use.

Reviews.Title: Great new durable phone.
Reviews.Author: James Peterson "YMMV"
Reviews.Content: Love the fact I don't have to worry about it getting wet.All the functions of the S4 with water resistance.I only wish I could get this with verizon coverage instead of att.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, waterproof is a bonus
Reviews.Author: Chris M. Hibbard "Chris"
Reviews.Content: This is a great Android phone.  Very fast, very large screen, but will fit in your front pocket just fine (men).

Reviews.Title: Should Have Waited
Reviews.Author: Jeanette McNally
Reviews.Content: endless daily reboots. /  periodic factory resetting  / no visual voicemail, thanks ATT! /  Messaging Apps non-responsiveM8 here i come....Sorry Samsung

Reviews.Title: Beats AT&T;
Reviews.Author: andy
Reviews.Content: Thank you for this product. The same phone with AT&T; was twice as much.  I am very satisfied with my new phone.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Jonathan A.
Reviews.Content: When I bought this, it was $0.01 plus fees, while the S4 was $50. This is a good free smart phone, in addition to the safety from water hazards. My friend flipped when her boyfriend clumsily spilled some Velveeta on my phone and I casually ran it under the kitchen sink to clean it. I also take calls in the shower. There are a few problems with the hardware drivers, one being that it has a terribly difficult time telling how dim the screen should be on auto when it's not in direct light. I keep turning off and on auto depending on how I want the screen to be, in other words manually adjusting it.. There are other software problems relating to the hardware, including the screen, but these are all livable. Overall, it's a good phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Michelle Tarr
Reviews.Content: Had an IPhone for years and now prefer Samsung over Apple.  The screen is bigger, the phone is lighter...Great choice, for sure!

Reviews.Title: YUCK!
Reviews.Author: gw gonyaw
Reviews.Content: Buy something else.  I can't text with this pos because the buttons are too small.  So many features and very little user support.  Unless you have hours of time to experiment with the features don't even think you will understand it all.  Trap doors, multilevel functioning, multiple windows, etc.  I want my Blackberry back

Reviews.Title: Samsung surpassed HTC
Reviews.Author: Daniel Alvarez
Reviews.Content: The title says it all. I went from HTC to Samsung due to the memory capacity that S4 Active can hold.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: onehappyamazonian
Reviews.Content: Love this phone. It works great and although I have been afraid to test its water proof-ability, I have faith that it will work. Key thing will be to remember when buying cases that this phone has a slightly different button size/layout than the regular s4.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time with this device.
Reviews.Author: Calvin D.
Reviews.Content: I was so disappointed with this device. The phone would download apps all by itself, it refused to bring up the 157 email messages that I had missed for over a week.  I felt like I had taken a step backwards with technology. After nine days of use, I went back to my iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Steven Hinkle
Reviews.Content: I had the Galaxy S3 before with verizon. The active S4 is better with AT&T;'s network. The faster processor is awesome. Network speeds with AT&T; are really great. The flashlight function is also handy. The S3 needed software for this function. The S4 has in built in, by just pressing the volume up button while the phone is in sleep mode.

Reviews.Title: Great Cellphone
Reviews.Author: Marilyn K. Southmayd
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  It is large enough to be able to see the keyboard when I text.  Plays my music great when I am away from home.  Takes lovely pictures.

Reviews.Title: Misses the point entirely
Reviews.Author: Anna Giladi
Reviews.Content: I had the regular S4 before, but after my cats threw it off the table and into their water dish, it slowly died from corrosion. Slowly enough so, that I could back up all my data as the only problem was really that the power circuit was broken and the battery could no longer be recharged. Once I backed everything up, I snapped the phone in half and tossed it to prevent anyone from salvaging anything that could be reused to their advantage or profit, when obviously, I could no longer enjoy what still had outstanding payments.The guys at the Samsung store at the Grand Canyon mall in Haifa, Israel, recommended the Active version for my purposes. What can I say? 2 weeks into purchase, the battery started bloating to a point where my phone uncontrollably switched itself off. When I took it to buy a new battery at a non-Samsung store, the guy told me I had been lucky because the battery had been so bloated it was about to blow up in my face.Then, around 2 months after purchase, after having used it paranoidly gently to make sure nothing ever happens to my expensive phone again, the charger/USB bus cover just snapped off from premature wear. I had kept it out of reach of my pets, and since I could tell just by looking at that tiny strip of rubber, I knew I had to be very gentle. Despite this supposedly being extra rugged...Now imagine my disappointment: as a passionate snorkeler and diver in the red sea's coral reefs, I can no longer do what was the other reason to get this phone: underwater shots of dolphins and reef life. It is no longer waterproof. What is it good for now? Since Samsung had already, for some absurd reason, reduced the number of megapixels, and the pictures taken are visibly worse than the ones taken with the regular S4, this was another major blow. I can't really carry my gigantic SLR with me everywhere, can I?About 2 months ago, I had my phone in my pocket for 10 minutes while walking the dog. I did not fall, I did not even use the phone or bump the pocket. As I pulled it out, there was a diagonal crack all the way from the upper right to the lower left corner of the screen. Nothing obtrusive, but there is a CRACK in my "rugged" phone from being in my POCKET.I would really like my money back since underwater photography was dear to me and all these repairs will cost me. I know for sure they are not covered by warranty, because they all look like blunt force trauma, when I really just used it normally and, in spite of all of Samsung's promises, extra carefully.Ah, and the bloatware. I had to complicatedly root this device just to get rid of the obnoxious shutter sound. Why does Samsung want to force me to pretend-play "real camera" with redundant sound effects? For the technologically inexperienced etc. the sound should be optionally available, but for those who don't want to tell the world that they've just taken a selfie, it needs to be optionally mutable.I have hundreds of dollars still to pay off, when the phone itself has worn itself down to the value of a Fisherprice phone. And for once, I did nothing to cause this premature decay.

Reviews.Title: Great Upgrade
Reviews.Author: Shelby L. Greaves
Reviews.Content: I really dig this phone so far, it has all the features for which I am looking, plus it's water resistant to one meter (hence the active), which I am too timid at this point to try.Has interchangeable battery and an SD card slot. A rarity these days!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: keasha
Reviews.Content: We love our phones it was time for me to up grade after ten years. So I went with the samsung galaxy s4 active. I brought two phones. We love our phones thanks

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier!
Reviews.Author: Shoemakers
Reviews.Content: Phone works great. Bought it for the dust and waterproof attributes (I am an electrician) but love it for everything else too. Great screen, ok camera, fast and reliable. No problems to date.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy S4 Active
Reviews.Author: Tracy Grigsby
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my son due to this was the phone he wanted. He was completely satisfied with the phone and I was completely satisfied with the price and delivery time!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Great product, I am very happy with my purchase.  The quality and price was great!  I would definitely recommend this to friends!

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Anthony Cibelli
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Still figuring out more everyday on the capabilities of this device. Best Galaxy yet, and waterproof. Get the Poetic Atmosphere case to go along with it. The only thing that is kinda weird are the buttons below. They're raised and take some getting use to.

Reviews.Title: Great phone just wonderful
Reviews.Author: Larry Dannatt
Reviews.Content: wonderful just a little large for me, but love the phone it works great.  Wish this was made in the mini

Reviews.Title: Amazing device!
Reviews.Author: Heather Linthurst
Reviews.Content: My husband LOVES his new phone.  Lightening fast and amazing display!  We couldn't have asked for a better phone to suit his needs!

Reviews.Title: Phone screen went black
Reviews.Author: Karen Adams
Reviews.Content: Screen went black after 3 weeks of use.  Can't reset or fix issue.  This phone is defective and does not work when volume and power button pressed as recommended

Reviews.Title: Best of Both Worlds
Reviews.Author: Obon Allen
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the s4 active. I upgraded from the Rugby Smart, I was going to get the Rugby Pro then I herd about the s4 active, I'm glad I waited. There's no such thing as a perfect device. So saying that where else can you get a device that has a proven os, durable design, then on top of that it's dust and water resistant. So in conclusion in my opinion it's the best of both worlds, and on top of that it's affordable.

Reviews.Title: Misinformation
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: Came in a different color. I selected keep my existing plan. It signed me up for a completely different plan.

Reviews.Title: Far End Echo on 3 different phones
Reviews.Author: disappointed "kenarakelian"
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE!This is a nice phone but there is an echo for the far end caller when I use the ear piece.I've had the phone replace 3 times and each of them has the same defect.

Reviews.Title: wow, what a piece of....
Reviews.Author: robert "ilikeitalot"
Reviews.Content: junk. okay, not all that bad. the good - big screen, clear bright colors, overall the images and the resolution is great. the bad - mainly the phone feature and then the "geek" factor in all of the silly options just to keep the techie freaks happy. i only needed a phone that works and is able to be stable during use. during a call the phone heats up real fast!, the keypad starts to jump around and zoom and zoom out on its own. if theres a need to hit certain keys during a call it sometimes doesnt let me since its zoomed in so much i can only see a few numbers to press. very frustrating and really, what is the basic feature of this gadget? A PHONE!. i updated the software hoping it would clear it up but nothing. i cant wait for apple to come out with its bigger screen this year. im "upgrading" to it as as fast as possible. the only reason i bought this phone was that the iphone didnt come out with a larger screen. now i see why apple is so popular. so many people poop on apple but their iphone at least is the best out there. i had the old 3gs and it worked perfectly, didnt heat up, USER friendly(very important). there are some of us out there who dont care about "developer mode". what a bunch of crap. i realize now that samsung is for the techie geeks who like to keep their fingers busy and the iphone is the least frustrating phone out there. two worlds of mobile phone users i guess.

Reviews.Title: Home Button non responsive
Reviews.Author: speddu
Reviews.Content: [Update] Got the replacement device and the home button works fine.Issue:the physical/hardware Home button does not work properly.Had to click multiple times to engage.The menu and return hardware buttons work perfectly.Note that this is not the software delay where disabling s-voice improves the home button response.The Good:Decent build quality and has all the features I want(and more) in the phone.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S4 Active, Urban Gray 16GB (AT&T;)
